translation.en: Have you ever wondered what makes things glow?
translation.ja: なぜ ものは光(ひか)るの？

translation.en: Today, we're gonna focus on one of my favorites. Things that are...
translation.ja: きょうのテーマは わたしの大(だい)すきな…

translation.en: fluorescent.
translation.ja: けい光(こう)よ

translation.en: ♪ Emily's Wonder Lab ♪
translation.ja: エミリーのワンダーラボ

translation.en: ♪ Stay curious and keep exploring ♪
translation.ja: 疑問(ぎもん)があれば調(しら)べよう

translation.en: Hey, little scientists, come on in.
translation.ja: 科学(かがく)キッズたち

translation.en: - Hi, Miss Emily! - Hello.
translation.ja: エミリー ようこそ

translation.en: Welcome!
translation.ja: ようこそ

translation.en: - - Now, art is pretty cool, right?
translation.ja: アートって たのしいよね

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.ja: うん！

translation.en: But we're not doing art today.
translation.ja: でも きょうはしない

translation.en: - We're doing science. - Yes!
translation.ja: 科学(かがく)をやる やった！

translation.en: Yes!
translation.ja: やった！

translation.en: I wish there were a way that we could combine the two.
translation.ja: いっしょにアートもしたいな

translation.en: Ooh. Maybe there is.
translation.ja: できるかも

translation.en: Today, we are gonna make our own fluorescent paint.
translation.ja: けい光(こう)の絵(え)の具(ぐ)を作(つく)ろう

translation.en: - Whoa. - That's gonna be fun.
translation.ja: たのしそう！

translation.en: Emily wants us to make fluorescent paint! Could she be any cooler?
translation.ja: けい光(こう)の絵(え)の具(ぐ)なんて カッコよすぎる

translation.en: But before we start making fluorescent paint,
translation.ja: 絵(え)の具(ぐ)を作(つく)るまえに―

translation.en: we just have to turn off the visible light...
translation.ja: へやのライトをけそう

translation.en: - ...and turn on... - Wow!
translation.ja: どう？

translation.en: the invisible lights.
translation.ja: べつの光(ひかり)があらわれた

translation.en: - Cool! - Whoa!
translation.ja: すごい！

translation.en: I love everything that glows, so today is my new favorite day.
translation.ja: 光(ひか)るものが すきだから たのしみ

translation.en: Like, it's a dream, but in real life!
translation.ja: おきてるのに ゆめみたい

translation.en: This isn't just the ground. This is the floor- escent!
translation.ja: ゆかを見(み)て ピッカピカでしょ

translation.en: Follow the path on the ground to your stations and get all of your materials,
translation.ja: 光(ひかり)をたどって ざいりょうをとってきて

translation.en: - then come back to the table. - Let's do this!
translation.ja: 光(ひかり)をたどって ざいりょうをとってきて やるぞ

translation.en: I love stuff that glows!
translation.ja: 光(ひか)るもの 大(だい)すき！

translation.en: Toys that glow, glow sticks.
translation.ja: 光(ひか)る おもちゃ

translation.en: Neon T- shirts, signs, lights.
translation.ja: 光(ひか)るＴシャツや かんばん

translation.en: It's like a glow party!
translation.ja: 光(ひか)るパーティーよ

translation.en: Emily, I wonder, what kind of lights are these?
translation.ja: けい光(こう)って どういう光(ひかり)？

translation.en: Ooh, good question, Zaela.
translation.ja: いい しつ問(もん)ね

translation.en: These lights that we are seeing right now are known as black lights,
translation.ja: いま見(み)てるのは ブラックライト

translation.en: and they're emitting a lot of ultraviolet light.
translation.ja: し外線(がいせん)を出(だ)すライトよ

translation.en: Emily, why do sunglasses say UV protection?
translation.ja: サングラスの “ＵＶカット”って？

translation.en: So, UV stands for ultraviolet.
translation.ja: ＵＶは し外線(がいせん)のこと

translation.en: It's protecting you from the ultraviolet light that comes from the sun.
translation.ja: 太陽(たいよう)が出(だ)す し外線(がいせん)を カットするといういみよ

translation.en: It's really, really energetic, but that means that it can hurt our eyes, and it can even hurt our skin.
translation.ja: し外線(がいせん)は つよいから 目(め)や ひふをいためてしまう

translation.en: - Sunscreen... - Oh, yeah. ...also has UV protection.
translation.ja: 日(ひ)やけどめクリームも ＵＶカットよ

translation.en: - That's cool. - I never knew that.
translation.ja: そうか しらなかった

translation.en: I thought I know everything about science.
translation.ja: 科学(かがく)は大(だい)とくいだけど―

translation.en: No, Emily knows more!
translation.ja: エミリーには まけた

translation.en: Hey, Emily, if UV light comes from the sun, then why don't we see it like this light?
translation.ja: し外線(がいせん)は見(み)えないのに なぜこのライトは見(み)えるの？

translation.en: That's a very good question, Zaela.
translation.ja: また いいしつ問(もん)ね

translation.en: You know the colors of the rainbow?
translation.ja: にじの色(いろ)は？

translation.en: Red, orange, yellow, green, blue...
translation.ja: 赤(あか) オレンジ 黄(き) みどり 青(あお)…

translation.en: At the end, you have indigo and violet.
translation.ja: そして あい色(いろ)とむらさき

translation.en: After violet comes ultraviolet.
translation.ja: むらさきのつぎが し外線(がいせん)なの

translation.en: Light that we can't really see with our eyes.
translation.ja: し外線(がいせん)は見(み)えないから―

translation.en: So black light has ultraviolet light, but it also has a little bit of violet light.
translation.ja: ブラックライトは むらさきの光(ひかり)も出(だ)してる

translation.en: That's why we see it as kind of this purply glow.
translation.ja: だから目(め)に見(み)えるのよ

translation.en: - What? - That's so cool.
translation.ja: ステキ

translation.en: - Ultraviolet? - Yeah. It sounds like the name of an alien planet.
translation.ja: し外線(がいせん)って ふしぎな名(な)まえよね

translation.en: It does sound like the name of an alien planet.
translation.ja: エイリアンっぽい

translation.en: So, fluorescents work with ultraviolet light.
translation.ja: けい光(こう)にかかせない し外線(がいせん)は―

translation.en: The invisible light. It's really, really highly energetic light.
translation.ja: 目(め)に見(み)えないけど とてもエネルギッシュなの

translation.en: And when it hits the fluorescent paint, the fluorescent paint absorbs some of that energy
translation.ja: けい光(こう)の絵(え)の具(ぐ)にあてると 絵(え)の具(ぐ)はエネルギーをすい―

translation.en: and releases the rest of it
translation.ja: けい光(こう)の絵(え)の具(ぐ)にあてると 絵(え)の具(ぐ)はエネルギーをすい― のこりを光(ひかり)として出(だ)す

translation.en: with light that we can actually see with our eyes.
translation.ja: のこりを光(ひかり)として出(だ)す

translation.en: - That's cool. So cool. - Cool.
translation.ja: カッコいい

translation.en: So to see that further, - I have a ping- pong ball. - Yeah.
translation.ja: ピンポン玉(だま)で せつめいするわ

translation.en: Okay, this ping- pong ball is like our ultraviolet light.
translation.ja: これをし外線(がいせん)だとおもってね

translation.en: And pretend that the table is like our fluorescent paint.
translation.ja: テーブルは けい光(こう)の絵(え)の具(ぐ)よ

translation.en: So, the ultraviolet light comes in really fast, at the speed of light, with highly energetic particles,
translation.ja: し外線(がいせん)が光(ひかり)のはやさで おちると―

translation.en: and some of the energy is absorbed into the table,
translation.ja: エネルギーの一(いち)ぶは すいこまれる

translation.en: and some of that energy is released back to us with light we can see.
translation.ja: そして のこりは 光(ひかり)としてもどる

translation.en: So when the ball bounces back up, that's the light we see with our eyes.
translation.ja: それが はねかえったピンポン玉(だま)よ

translation.en: Cool!
translation.ja: なるほど

translation.en: Yeah. And one ping- pong ball is cool, but it doesn't really illustrate the entire process,
translation.ja: でもピンポン玉(だま)１つでは あらわせない

translation.en: because that's happening with every single atom inside our fluorescent paint.
translation.ja: 原子(げんし)１つ１つに これがおきてるからよ

translation.en: And there are trillions and trillions of atoms - inside the fluorescent paint. - Trillions?
translation.ja: 絵(え)の具(ぐ)の中(なか)には なん兆(ちょう)もの原子(げんし)がある

translation.en: - Trillions? - Whoa!
translation.ja: 兆(ちょう)？

translation.en: So instead of one ball, we need tons of them.
translation.ja: ピンポン玉(だま)が もっと ほしいわね

translation.en: Science is so fun!
translation.ja: 科学(かがく) たのしい！

translation.en: Don't tell Emily, but I'm keeping this one.
translation.ja: こっそり１つもらう

translation.en: Pink is my favorite color.
translation.ja: ピンク すきなの

translation.en: When all those ping- pong balls were coming down, that was like the highly energetic rays of ultraviolet light,
translation.ja: し外線(がいせん)は いまみたいに ふってくる

translation.en: and when they bounced back up, that's like the spectacular parade of photons
translation.ja: そして光(ひかり)のつぶが はねかえり―

translation.en: that we see as different colors of light.
translation.ja: いろんな色(いろ)で光(ひか)る

translation.en: That is so cool.
translation.ja: カッコいい

translation.en: Emily makes science fun.
translation.ja: エミリーの科学(かがく)は たのしい

translation.en: Ping- pong balls and glow- y stuff?
translation.ja: 光(ひか)るピンポン玉(だま)？

translation.en: Wait a minute, is this a surprise birthday party for me?
translation.ja: バースデーパーティーみたい

translation.en: So, you guys ready to make some fluorescent paint yourself?
translation.ja: けい光(こう)の絵(え)の具(ぐ) 作(つく)りたい？

translation.en: - Yeah! - Okay. Get your mixing bowls ready,
translation.ja: じゃあビーカーをもって

translation.en: we're gonna create three different colors of fluorescent paint.
translation.ja: ３つの色(いろ)を作(つく)ろう

translation.en: These are the insides of highlighters...
translation.ja: これは けい光(こう)ペンの ざいりょうよ

translation.en: Wow! ...which contain chemicals that are fluorescent.
translation.ja: 光(ひか)る化学物質(かがくぶっしつ)が入(はい)ってる

translation.en: And so you want to take the color of your choice
translation.ja: 色(いろ)をえらんで―

translation.en: and start pouring a little bit of water over the top while you squeeze it.
translation.ja: おしつぶしながら 水(みず)をかけてみて

translation.en: Look how that glows in the light.
translation.ja: 光(ひか)るでしょ？

translation.en: Can I combine colors?
translation.ja: 色(いろ)をまぜていい？

translation.en: - You can combine colors. - Whoa! This is about experimenting. - Do whatever you want. - Yeah!
translation.ja: もちろん じゆうに実験(じっけん)してみて

translation.en: The other thing you want to do is we're gonna do a little scoop of cornstarch,
translation.ja: あとはコーンスターチを ひとすくい足(た)して―

translation.en: just to thicken up our paint.
translation.ja: ドロッとさせる

translation.en: - All right? - Oh, my fingers are glowing!
translation.ja: ゆびが光(ひか)ってる

translation.en: - Your fingers are fluorescent. - Cool!
translation.ja: ゆびが けい光(こう)してるの

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. - Look at Nathan's face! - Whoa!
translation.ja: メイソンのかおを見(み)てよ

translation.en: Your face is fluorescent.
translation.ja: けい光(こう)してる

translation.en: - Really? - Yeah!
translation.ja: ほんと？

translation.en: We're glowing! We're glowing!
translation.ja: みんな光(ひか)ってる

translation.en: I'm glowing! I'm glowing!
translation.ja: ぼくも

translation.en: Ooh, this experiment makes me so happy. The messier, the better!
translation.ja: この実験(じっけん) メチャクチャで しあわせ！

translation.en: I feel like a scientist.
translation.ja: 科学者(かがくしゃ)みたい

translation.en: Oh, no!
translation.ja: ウソだろ

translation.en: No! I put too much in.
translation.ja: ヤバい　入(い)れすぎた

translation.en: Oh, don't worry about it.
translation.ja: いいのよ

translation.en: - Science is all about trial and error. - Oh, you're right.
translation.ja: 科学(かがく)は失敗(しっぱい)して学(まな)ぶの

translation.en: We're gonna add more cornstarch to thicken it up.
translation.ja: コーンスターチを足(た)そう

translation.en: Look how much this is glowing.
translation.ja: すごく光(ひか)ってる

translation.en: This is amazing.
translation.ja: たのしい！

translation.en: - Scientists, are you ready to go paint? - Yeah!
translation.ja: 絵(え)をかいてみる？

translation.en: Okay, take your materials and let's go over to our canvas.
translation.ja: 絵(え)の具(ぐ)をもってカンバスへ

translation.en: Okay, guys. Wow.
translation.ja: かくぞ

translation.en: Look at that.
translation.ja: すごいわ

translation.en: It is gonna be a masterpiece.
translation.ja: けっ作(さく)になりそう

translation.en: I love painting. It's all over my hands and my hair.
translation.ja: 手(て)も かみのけもベタベタ

translation.en: - I'm going to paint my nails green! -
translation.ja: つめをぬろう

translation.en: It's awesome!
translation.ja: さいこう！

translation.en: Remember, art is all about exploring new boundaries.
translation.ja: アートは せかいをひろげるもの

translation.en: And art and science is about expressing yourself.
translation.ja: アートと科学(かがく)は じぶんをひょうげんするもの

translation.en: So, put down those paintbrushes,
translation.ja: だから ここからは―

translation.en: and put your body into it.
translation.ja: からだで かこう

translation.en: ♪ These kids are glowing in the dark ♪
translation.ja: キッズは くらやみで光(ひか)る

translation.en: ♪ They're glowing in the dark, yeah Glowing in the dark ♪
translation.ja: キッズは くらやみで光(ひか)る くらやみで光(ひか)ってる

translation.en: ♪ They're glowing in the dark ♪
translation.ja: くらやみで光(ひか)ってる

translation.en: ♪ These kids are glowing in the dark They're glowing in the dark, yeah ♪
translation.ja: キッズは くらやみで光(ひか)る

translation.en: Science is messy, and I'm all about messes.
translation.ja: 科学(かがく)ってメチャクチャ

translation.en: ♪ How do they do it? ♪
translation.ja: どう？

translation.en: ♪ How do they glow? ♪
translation.ja: 光(ひか)ってる？

translation.en: - ♪ Did they eat some magic nachos? ♪ - One more.
translation.ja: まほうのおやつを 　　　　たべたみたい

translation.en: ♪ Glowing on their skin And on their clothes ♪
translation.ja: からだも ふくも光(ひか)る

translation.en: I look a mess!
translation.ja: グチャグチャだ

translation.en: ♪ I bet Emily knows ♪
translation.ja: エミリーは しってる

translation.en: ♪ Why those kids are glowing in the dark Glowing in the dark, yeah ♪
translation.ja: キッズは くらやみで光(ひか)る

translation.en: ♪ Glowing in the dark They're glowing in the dark ♪
translation.ja: くらやみで光(ひか)ってる

translation.en: - - Okay, little scientists,
translation.ja: くらやみで光(ひか)ってる みんな

translation.en: today we learned all about ultraviolet light, fluorescent paint,
translation.ja: きょうは し外線(がいせん)と けい光(こう)のことを学(まな)び―

translation.en: and all about how to combine art with science.
translation.ja: アートと科学(かがく)をくっつけた

translation.en: And remember, stay curious...
translation.ja: 疑問(ぎもん)があれば―

translation.en: And keep exploring!
translation.ja: 調(しら)べてみよう！

translation.en: ♪ Emily's Wonder Lab ♪
translation.ja: エミリーのワンダーラボ

translation.en: ♪ Stay curious and keep exploring ♪
translation.ja: 疑問(ぎもん)があれば調(しら)べよう

translation.en: For today's at- home experiment, we are going to make our very own lava lamp using the power of density.
translation.ja: きょうの“お家(うち)で実験(じっけん)”は 濃度(のうど)の力(ちから)でラバランプを作(つく)る

translation.en: Now, remember, all kid scientists need a grown- up's approval.
translation.ja: きょうの“お家(うち)で実験(じっけん)”は 濃度(のうど)の力(ちから)でラバランプを作(つく)る 大人(おとな)の許可(きょか)をとってね

translation.en: So, for this one, you need a little bit of water, a glass, like this,
translation.ja: よういするのは水(みず)と ガラスのコップ

translation.en: some vegetable oil,
translation.ja: 植物油(しょくぶつゆ)

translation.en: salt,
translation.ja: 塩(しお)

translation.en: and to go with the theme of the day, we have some phosphorescent powder and a UV light,
translation.ja: きょうのテーマに合(あ)わせて りん光(こう)の粉(こな)とブラックライト

translation.en: because we wanna make our lava lamp glow.
translation.ja: 光(ひか)るラバランプにするの

translation.en: So, the first thing you wanna do is fill your glass most of the way with water.
translation.ja: まずはコップに たっぷりと水(みず)をそそぐ

translation.en: And then, you wanna add your vegetable oil.
translation.ja: そこに植物油(しょくぶつゆ)を足(た)してね

translation.en: So, if we watch what happens here, watch closely,
translation.ja: どうなるか よく見(み)てて

translation.en: because the vegetable oil is rising to the top.
translation.ja: 油(あぶら)が上(うえ)にういてきた

translation.en: That's because vegetable oil is less dense than water.
translation.ja: 水(みず)よりも 濃度(のうど)がひくいからよ

translation.en: It's lighter than water, so it rises to the top.
translation.ja: 水(みず)よりかるいから うく

translation.en: Now, to start our lava lamp effect, we have some salt here.
translation.ja: ラバランプのうごきは 塩(しお)で作(つく)ろう

translation.en: Salt is heavier than water, so it's gonna wanna fall to the bottom.
translation.ja: 塩(しお)は水(みず)よりおもいから しずむの

translation.en: So when I add it here,
translation.ja: 入(い)れるわよ

translation.en: you can see what happens.
translation.ja: どうなるかな？

translation.en: It's grabbing onto the molecules in the oil, and taking down some of that oil with it.
translation.ja: 塩(しお)が油(あぶら)の分子(ぶんし)をとらえて いっしょに しずんだ

translation.en: But once it gets down to the bottom, the salt dissolves in water,
translation.ja: 下(した)までしずむと 塩(しお)が水(みず)にとけて―

translation.en: and you can see the oil starts rising to the top again.
translation.ja: また油(あぶら)が上(うえ)にういてくる

translation.en: And we're seeing that same effect that we had before.
translation.ja: さいしょみたいにね

translation.en: But we want to make it glow, right? So let's add some phosphorescent powder.
translation.ja: 光(ひか)らせたいから りん光(こう)の粉(こな)を足(た)そう

translation.en: And we're gonna make this glow really bright orange.
translation.ja: あかるいオレンジ色(いろ)にする

translation.en: Mix, mix, mix, mix.
translation.ja: 入(い)れて…

translation.en: Okay, so, now, all we need is our UV light
translation.ja: そこにブラックライトを あてれば―

translation.en: so we can see this glow in action.
translation.ja: 光(ひか)るから見(み)てて

translation.en: Look at that, that worked so well!
translation.ja: ほらね　うまくいった

translation.en: And the fun part about this is that you can do this again and again.
translation.ja: なんどもできるのが たのしいの

translation.en: And look at that, look how cool that is.
translation.ja: 見(み)て ステキね

translation.en: That is how you make your very own glowing lava lamp.
translation.ja: じぶんだけの ラバランプができた

translation.en: ♪ Emily's Wonder Lab ♪
translation.ja: エミリーのワンダーラボ

translation.en: ♪ Stay curious and keep exploring ♪
translation.ja: 疑問(ぎもん)があれば調(しら)べよう

translation.en: ♪ Emily's Wonder Lab ♪
translation.ja: エミリーのワンダーラボ

translation.en: ♪ Stay curious and keep exploring ♪
translation.ja: 疑問(ぎもん)があれば調(しら)べよう

translation.en: ♪ Emily's Wonder Lab ♪
translation.ja: エミリーのワンダーラボ

translation.en: ♪ Stay curious and keep exploring ♪
translation.ja: 疑問(ぎもん)があれば調(しら)べよう
